thread.title: Watch the Incredible Snafu That Had La La Land Announced as Best Picture Instead of Actual Winner Moonlight
thread.title_full: Watch the Incredible Snafu That Had La La Land Announced as Best Picture Instead of Actual Winner Moonlight

author: Joe DePaolo
title: Watch the Incredible Snafu That Had La La Land Announced as Best Picture Instead of Actual Winner Moonlight
text:
Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s Very, Very Bad Decision video Watch the Incredible Snafu That Had La La Land Announced as Best Picture Instead of Actual Winner Moonlight by Joe DePaolo | 12:16 am, February 27th, 2017 
What? Just? Happened? 
At the conclusion of Sunday night’s Academy Awards, actor Warren Beatty announced La La Land as Best Picture. But it turned out Moonlight had actually won. 
The entire La La Land team was on the stage, and the acceptance speeches had nearly concluded, when host Jimmy Kimmel and Beatty emerged with the news that Moonlight had actually claimed the award. 
Many news organizations had already posted that La La Land was the winner. 
But indeed, that was not the case. 
“I blame Steve Harvey ,” Kimmel said. 
The Moonlight cast eventually made their way up to accept the honor. 
We’ll try to make sense of this in a moment, and will soon have the video posted via ABC. 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
